attributes.action: increase the minimum spend that customs duty and import VAT is levied on from goods bought from both inside and outside the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment, customs duty is payable if the duty is £7 and over while import VAT is payable on goods if their value is £18 or over.

These limits should be increased as the value of non-domestic goods also increase.
